subject: 'newbie' here...looking for junit.textui.TestRunner
msgSnippet: Hi, newbie here. I m looking for tools to test java and ejb. So far, I ve evaluated jtest and Jython. I m now looking at JUnit...I ve downloaded and
messageBody:
Hi,
'newbie' here. I'm looking for tools to test java and ejb. So far,
I've evaluated jtest and Jython.

I'm now looking at JUnit...I've downloaded and installed JUnit3.4 and
ran the installation tests...everything went ok...

I'm curious as to where the batch, graphical and Swing based
graphical executables, namely, junit.testui.TestRunner,
junit.ui.TestRunner and
junit.swingui.TestRunner are.

I searched the installed JUnit3.4 folder the various jar files but I
can't find these executables...not a problem but it's driving me nuts
that I can't find them.

I'd appreciate any help.
Thanks,
Pat
